feed.title: Prowlarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.13.3.4273
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 02bc40b9b6406767967b4c1413baaed2d5bbbf27 Translations for indexer settings
  • 83e7e30e4ff2eef769c69320a3e520542a39c674 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • ae870fd46a7a9d2b3db08e6c993478778b4836b7 Improve HDBits Settings Helptext
  • 33b7ba8725ff2e21bd241d8d25f4e40cbb7f5169 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • dd2567a85fde79e417e76a4f3c0410a583451c14 Fixed: Refresh tags state to clear removed tags by housekeeping
  • 264ff8f8855fbc41676eef810d4d733fd3e1fe30 Revert "Enable browser navigation buttons for PWA"
  • 629c6a88910612aa6a4e063440a06b85263bf7c1 Fixed: Redirecting after login with urlbase
  • 0ce2f96789ddcfc6c9740ca3d8960d8d891c27a4 New: Log database engine version on startup
  • cd7d1571db373de08e219a2171d36011d71ba441 Fixed: Don't use sub folder to check for free disk space for update
  • 4558f552820b52bb1f9cd97fdabe03654ce9924a Hints for week column and short dates in UI settings
See More * 21589fda573f930cb3e175fb0107da766da6daf5 Bump version to 1.13.3 * 3496263cd2a9065590789dc91988af0ad3e5700e Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 1bb1ec6106caddfa0b1f4c1b5f38fef11c649286 Fixed: (IPTorrents) Include episodes in season search * 2bfb83893377aae2649d053ae789b1617ef9d747 Bind shortcut for pending changes confirmation only when it's shown * 9eb291f5785dc190c30ea7f9a8df7f699e51389d Fixed: Avoid trailing slash in Proxy Url sent to FlareSolverr * 8cf892124cedff4f168d3ba1dfeb0b2c86b9fa2f Automated API Docs update * 47fb886930ca69c03ec71cc97bea37e68eeb525b Don't clone indexer API Key * 5034a211cbe2cdf64f2d2ec58f38639c42277a20 New: Don't return API Keys and Passwords via the API * ed1364b6ffae3d5b29242f490bae40f3b79cf8c7 Update magnet trackers * 71e18b616d502f10a75948e8adbbff4ada9a755f Bump version to 1.13.2 * f7bf21df6880d4ad813eb064a9cd3c3ad774e6ca Update help text for Tags usage in Applications * d764e3405d7ee69c52431ebba6e98093954e0bb2 New: (Torznab) Internal and Scene tags * 16baceb784faf80ae352b9b718db6bbec425a790 New: Option to disable Email encryption * 5d2b80d15a2ccde010a4966efbbaea130c3d92d1 Fixed: (SubsPlease) Parse release size from magnet links * a20a81f424998750a7406948f740aa0424232bb9 New: Category filter for Indexers * ebb66e9086b73d4b4ffb8e3f8552ca31f3bd37ba Update database migration version translation token * cb8797693ec3f729adc6d6c43fabc9bd9ef20736 Fixed: Sorting by name in Manage Applications and Download Client modals * 255c6335ae04fd50589dd617f500ac2ed201b000 New: Add sorting to Manage Applications and Download Client modals * 155cd53dcdc02eda1d2be04e1ad7d6d0ae88e18b Fix translations for manage applications and download clients * ae70a96c10f272d51ab60a2663bccf6d3d4e0931 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 16c0daf090e6926bb4b4e6375eeabc1a5889fd42 Fix value types for EnhancedSelectInputConnector * 34c78c5a9d6f0be4c6aa00a7887c5641138fbd61 Fixed: (BTN) Disable ID-based searches for episodes with absolute episode number * dd5b108ffdcff3ba2d2d4571253f691329e4230c Fixed: (BTN) Allow ID-based with text search query * 0b839862556a05437a548b1b747a2e91263c56cd Automated API Docs update * 2bd25fb6f32dae789356da3e8446f03831e53ff3 Reorder sync fields for App Profiles * 0f5eb5d3a34b0545c3cd0637445cda9227b63f5c Bump version to 1.13.1 * c9434c61e303ed1884c65b45f89ed8147ed574d7 Transpile logical assignment operators with babel * ee969b7a06efa2603d6516ea97b2e49228cc125a New: Log warning if less than 1 GB free space during update * cfdf88a1e2a8b7a89f2375a9afbad881eaf601c9 Add exceptions to logs for indexers and apps * 70a5dae2937d0f134c3bff956fb07cf2434da6f7 Fixed: Don't lowercase UrlBase in ConfigFileProvider * b53f8d4552d42f25a12252ad53c2fbbf2474ff9a Bump version to 1.13.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=104&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.14.3.4333
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • f0a8d22e84f5c024fb6f814fd236ab50b05a8d15 Improve Search Types selection for BHD
  • 50c6f15e1254a179ae95d83a03cf06a148786402 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 2e3a95f389b57545033203b9fb4bb8c12128ef68 Remove Status from IndexerDefinition
  • 3d52096eb46727afda66fecf510f9b4803446633 Downgrade YamlDotNet and improve logging for definitions update
  • e981cacbda6fab8b945ed51110efe10141ec8a09 Fixed: Disabled select option still selectable
  • 218371a318f35b3562d0e129ca85a8f5b48a8db7 Convert Queued Tasks to TS
  • 30fd7c8c2a9a669a2966989f8875df2b0257cc68 Fix stylelint command in package.json
  • 96d2d61fa0261199805978ae4ee5f400a0a35356 Add download clients notice about sync to applications
  • 17ff86aaea2f2db8a5610efe54b329a6b3137be7 Fixes: Missing default path for Download Station [ #2062 ]
  • 7f8c1ace147f96a34503e4ce04559b9046a19310 Replace special chars in search term with wildcard for RuTracker
See More * dc0edb7bc181e68cc77a3c9ed0b983a54f725ac5 Bump YamlDotNet, AngleSharp, BenchmarkDotNet * 2ac996c9f96c4a056144d5b67affeb488ea449b5 Bump version to 1.14.3 * 2ebabd69b59811053abef865fe7c5a8038782aba Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * b3738f1602ce8600daffaad71ca806bc731f41f2 Fixed: WebApp functionality on Apple devices * 882152b9117aadd621d1b248a36a233e5abc0527 Use proxied requests for indexers * a25e79031f263764c2402370588b4f16a5b64109 Fixed: Don't disable IPv6 in IPv6-only Environment * cc85060b1b2d6b44b31c4644f87a79910ad147df Bump version to 1.14.2 * 00bd9c241a103de5977b9e1faa6b48878d289de9 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 1283e06f95ddb1f331d3b119ec5e33e62c6d78e4 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * ab0108778a083197037e9dee567f02ed727e43a3 Fixed: (AnimeBytes) Artist and album search improvements * 099b04f7189a067c6ca2eac71dfe2019a0e61abc Update caniuse-lite * ecdc0a51a9ab8355ad9330822d7db9b9c550ae9d Fixed: Cleanse Discord Webhook URLs * 6c7c37affe8121338c36640e7abbf4525475eb36 Bump node to v20.x on builder * 45d378a2d908fc0909b777a43320070fe183e064 Automated API Docs update * 007601cb195ab380960a14b357825e5356eac725 Fixed: Selection of last added custom filter * 5f0d6e2fddde77905b5fb5180b549a0f8aae8d96 New: Sync Pack Seed Time to Whisparr applications [ #2039 ] * ede9879c999850a8e8a059d20ef28f618c5cf943 Cleanup obsolete definitions for ANT/ABB/BB/MTV/PTN/TVV * 7287abc77c4cf40d6153c356f9f0f3e2e882ec8a New: Sync Reject Blocklisted Torrent Hashes While Grabbing for torrent indexers to Apps * 8c653b5c09f7cff707554238aea0d8e749cbd4a9 Fixed: (GGn) Don't die on invalid FreeTorrent values in the API * 15c6b3c308a2139eac56adc05674073ce7432a29 Fixed: (Shazbat) Added season and episode to search capabilities * 9676447c74e7cf13f41a8982e61845990b8a81d3 Bump version to 1.14.1 * 5d35f1dcc7263b10b60a63c835f6683b9da00bee Fixed: (AvistaZ) Avoid parsing invalid JSON on auth [ #2030 ] * 858f16195e3f9d0613543f35501ad7740493bcb7 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * a1a5dd574e781616e1da99d71ced93deb9a2b03e Fixed: Using FlareSolverr in the same time with another HTTP/SOCKS proxy * a5ecc2dc9f44bb3821b89625e58232311b2fae27 Show download client ID as hint in select options * 7d46660583cb967a5538062ce6494c4a37dc39f1 Fixed: Updated base url for TorrentsCSV * 22cbf40e3c13a1a6be27aa80a0c0a4e14c8f24da Bump label-actions action to v4 * 25821c758f66274bd6941fd2597453762e46b7ca Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 6153737a78418b56958386fb7143b5923e4b3b18 Translations for download client settings * 07adb45d631127ec941ea91ea89f3fab51ff7a91 Bump version to 1.14.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=110&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.15.0.4361
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 41ce79ccce2b86f5c2006b9ba9d9dab39e02f392 Automated API Docs update
  • 14ae062db28141954a00a058c72a0be51ae6cf24 Fixed: Http Client getting network interfaces on aarch64 [ #2076 ]
  • d55a38da4a0679c27bf077467d65e13c7eead595 New: Allow HEAD requests to ping endpoint
  • ab289cfc868a704cc72b709e8f178b873d59a302 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 12671e99051c06d7fe02fb61bebe423f4637c74f New: Advanced settings toggle in indexer, notification and download client modals
  • a33023b8c6a83d33a65525275dfb6aa028460e6e New: Migrate M-Team - TP to API
  • a3e134ce0bf46993cb9a24926f59b5b6ebae000f Link indexer proxy settings from health page
  • ee7c821cabd4f3cb7531e055d8efc5045c2ae035 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • ee4cf93aee675f535dcafa38bf5649e32cbea228 Improve Indexer Proxy healthcheck messaging
  • 2cacfba81ff2ef65885be07dae113962ea71a6fa Fixed: Task progress messages in the UI
See More * 02e420580e97920e472c0200ef39d886673cf96c Fixed: (SubsPlease) Season search improvements and support for movie searches * d99398d3f8b0c088646ade25b1e38dbc01ed2ef1 Fix tests for PHD * 9ea8335aa0a2278e633bd61946d12c6fb2e9ad65 Update timezone offset for PHD/CZ * 52a91a50b246e60a19120bbf31fb46b2664ddc84 Remove duplicated parameter * 680bf46e25f9cabaa759bdd96e968c4511c8a9fe Fixed: (SceneHD) Category filtering [ #2028 ] * d279c97f159091e6c9c01471cbd3827e46191b73 New: Pass general proxy credentials to FlareSolverr [ #2073 ] * 7d5d338c8e48e3c6a2a71d929812f2daeff3a38b Improve search page button colors [ #2046 ] * 721ae1cac053a9c872e79bb0fa6e4d5b7f9d13a6 Fixed: (Cardigann) Avoid NullRef on forms with `multipart/form-data` * 3881c9d753c2ed6614eaf6a7e6bc513957736904 Remove bulk edit for Reject Blocklisted Torrent Hashes While Grabbing * 131b344119fd9a76423b5e92bd615a78925b6a9e Automated API Docs update * d226e528810a9233309944367316b75a6fbc9483 Fixed: Move Reject Blocklisted Torrent Hashes While Grabbing to applications * 583815b4f7a42f103be863214259923bb8c4a013 Bump version to 1.15.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Prowlarr/a958e221-aeac-4b0e-a862-d8ffe1df4b09/_release?releaseId=112&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.16.2.4435
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 5fee2c4cd9e5dcf3a892ba8747e4cdcdad1ff603 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate

entry.title: New release for Prowlarr: 1.17.2.4511
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Prowlarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 2c5f2187c88af5976c4cd3f14736bf0844c12f17 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 401ef88971e2572663fff4e88e5af53b48f924e1 Refactor PasswordInput to use type password
  • 4fb3754048634381f226205fd9acd615154bf911 Fixed: Text color for inputs on login page
  • 596efe8fb0f99a4ece555c0f3ce6e5b44ba883ca New: Dark theme for login screen
  • 076a4f2574a4bd83665182933340505080e45b77 Fix class name for AppIndexerMapRepository
  • 9561371a47f118bd161652a9243a51fb4ba23667 Automated API Docs update
  • 16254cf5f915602e398312a2300bde3f8a99c34c New: Option to select download client when multiple of the same type are configured
  • 649a03e5a09fe8a2d25da49281c45141d0320a18 New: Config file setting to disable log database (#2123)
  • dd21d9b521b37ce92f85a6aac3989a60ccf5e67b Fixed: Allow decimals for Seed Ratio
  • 68b895d2ad074de2a3b267039c1cfe4797fc18be Fixed: Don't share settings for same cached definition in CardigannRequestGenerator

Use newer Node.js task for in pipelines * 3e0af062c12728686c362489ff717feca69def60 Parameter binding for API requests * 858f85c50d4492cdeb3ab893d870ab3896e7a751 Fix translations for proxy validation * eee21de79585c0a8306491d2eafaa7fd627ccb0e Fixed: Handle download redirects to magnet links * 15fabbe7d087b3696a14795d9bb7c7cd2ee04628 Bump version to 1.17.1 * 6aef48c6e733725e77d7e918311abe7db5fd0c7b b223e9b0cca53aa4362a2abb09e44e51d16cbada Should not empty install folder, MirrorFolder will take care of it. * 77a982a7dadea51b95db3b813fa31f7272509165 Fixed: Retrying download on not suppressed HTTP
